message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"inside; in a space or area","sentence":"书在里。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image illustrating a book inside a box. The focus is on the book resting securely in the middle of the box, surrounded by muted, gentle apocalyptic lighting and subtle, worn textures, evoking both calm and a sense of a world in transition. The box is open to clearly show the book inside.","sentence_translation":"The book is inside."}
